verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַל־ <WH5921> upon אַיֶּ֥לֶת <WH365> upon Aijeleth הַשַּׁ֗חַר <WH7837> Shahar מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David אֵלִ֣י <WH410> My God אֵ֭לִי <WH410> my God לָמָ֣ה <WH4100> why עֲזַבְתָּ֑נִי <WH5800> why hast thou forsaken רָח֥וֹק <WH7350> me? [why art thou so] far מִֽ֝ישׁוּעָתִ֗י <WH3444> from helping דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> me [and from] the words שַׁאֲגָתִֽי׃ <WH7581> of my groaning

אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י <WH430> O my God אֶקְרָ֣א <WH7121> I cry י֭וֹמָם <WH3119> in the daytime וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> have no תַעֲנֶ֑ה <WH6030> but thou hearest וְ֝לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> not and in the night season וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> have no דֽוּמִיָּ֥ה <WH1747> and am not silent לִֽי׃
וְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You קָד֑וֹשׁ <WH6918> But thou [art] holy י֝וֹשֵׁ֗ב <WH3427> [O thou] that inhabitest תְּהִלּ֥וֹת <WH8416> the praises יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
בְּ֭ךָ בָּטְח֣וּ <WH982> trusted אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1> Our fathers בָּ֝טְח֗וּ <WH982> in thee they trusted וַֽתְּפַלְּטֵֽמוֹ׃ <WH6403> and thou didst deliver

אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> to you זָעֲק֣וּ <WH2199> They cried וְנִמְלָ֑טוּ <WH4422> unto thee and were delivered בְּךָ֖ בָטְח֣וּ <WH982> they trusted וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and were not בֽוֹשׁוּ׃ <WH954> in thee and were not confounded

וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I תוֹלַ֣עַת <WH8438> But I [am] a worm וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and not אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> and no man חֶרְפַּ֥ת <WH2781> a reproach אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> of men וּבְז֥וּי <WH959> and despised עָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people

כָּל־ <WH3605> All רֹ֭אַי <WH7200> All they that see יַלְעִ֣גוּ <WH3932> me laugh me to scorn לִ֑י יַפְטִ֥ירוּ <WH6362> separate בְ֝שָׂפָ֗ה <WH8193> the lip יָנִ֥יעוּ <WH5128> they shake רֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> the head

גֹּ֣ל <WH1556> He trusted אֶל־ <WH413> about יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> on the LORD יְפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ <WH6403> [that] he would deliver יַ֝צִּילֵ֗הוּ <WH5337> him let him deliver כִּ֘י <WH3588> because חָ֥פֵֽץ <WH2654> him seeing he delighted בּֽוֹ׃

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Yet אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> who גֹחִ֣י <WH1518> But thou [art] he that took מִבָּ֑טֶן <WH990> me out of the womb מַ֝בְטִיחִ֗י <WH982> thou didst make me hope עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׁדֵ֥י <WH7699> breasts אִמִּֽי׃ <WH517> [when I was] upon my mother's

עָ֭לֶיךָ <WH5921> upon הָשְׁלַ֣כְתִּי <WH7993> I was cast מֵרָ֑חֶם <WH7358> upon thee from the womb מִבֶּ֥טֶן <WH990> belly אִ֝מִּ֗י <WH517> from my mother's אֵ֣לִי <WH410> thou [art] my God אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you

אַל־ <WH408> be not תִּרְחַ֣ק <WH7368> Be not far מִ֭מֶּנִּי <WH4480> at כִּי־ <WH3588> for צָרָ֣ה <WH6869> from me for trouble קְרוֹבָ֑ה <WH7138> [is] near כִּי־ <WH3588> For אֵ֥ין <WH369> there עוֹזֵֽר׃ <WH5826> for [there is] none to help
סְ֭בָבוּנִי <WH5437> have compassed פָּרִ֣ים <WH6499> bulls רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> Many אַבִּירֵ֖י <WH47> me strong בָשָׁ֣ן <WH1316> [bulls] of Bashan כִּתְּרֽוּנִי׃ <WH3803> have beset me round
פָּצ֣וּ <WH6475> They gaped עָלַ֣י <WH5921> and פִּיהֶ֑ם <WH6310> upon me [with] their mouths אַ֝רְיֵ֗ה <WH738> lion טֹרֵ֥ף <WH2963> [as] a ravening וְשֹׁאֵֽג׃ <WH7580> and a roaring

כַּמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> like water נִשְׁפַּכְתִּי֮ <WH8210> I am poured out וְהִתְפָּֽרְד֗וּ <WH6504> are out of joint כָּֽל־ <WH3605> and all עַצְמ֫וֹתָ֥י <WH6106> and all my bones הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become לִ֭בִּי <WH3820> my heart כַּדּוֹנָ֑ג <WH1749> is like wax נָ֝מֵ֗ס <WH4549> it is melted בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst מֵעָֽי׃ <WH4578> of my bowels

יָ֘בֵ֤שׁ <WH3001> is dried up כַּחֶ֨רֶשׂ ׀ <WH2789> like a potsherd כֹּחִ֗י <WH3581> My strength וּ֭לְשׁוֹנִי <WH3956> and my tongue מֻדְבָּ֣ק <WH1692> cleaveth מַלְקוֹחָ֑י <WH4455> to my jaws וְֽלַעֲפַר־ <WH6083> me into the dust מָ֥וֶת <WH4194> of death תִּשְׁפְּתֵֽנִי׃ <WH8239> and thou hast brought

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for סְבָב֗וּנִי <WH5437> have compassed כְּלָ֫בִ֥ים <WH3611> For dogs עֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> me the assembly מְ֭רֵעִים <WH7489> of the wicked הִקִּיפ֑וּנִי <WH5362> have inclosed כָּ֝אֲרִ֗י <WH3738> dig יָדַ֥י <WH3027> my hands וְרַגְלָֽי׃ <WH7272> and my feet
אֲסַפֵּ֥ר <WH5608> I may tell כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַצְמוֹתָ֑י <WH6106> all my bones הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> They יַ֝בִּ֗יטוּ <WH5027> they look יִרְאוּ־ <WH7200> [and] stare בִֽי׃

יְחַלְּק֣וּ <WH2505> They part בְגָדַ֣י <WH899> my garments לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like וְעַל־ <WH5921> and for לְ֝בוּשִׁ֗י <WH3830> upon my vesture יַפִּ֥ילוּ <WH5307> among them and cast גוֹרָֽל׃ <WH1486> lots

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> from me O LORD אַל־ <WH408> be not תִּרְחָ֑ק <WH7368> But be not thou far אֱ֝יָלוּתִ֗י <WH360> O my strength לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <WH5833> thee to help חֽוּשָׁה׃ <WH2363> haste
הַצִּ֣ילָה <WH5337> Deliver מֵחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> from the sword נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> my soul מִיַּד־ <WH3027> from the power כֶּ֝֗לֶב <WH3611> of the dog יְחִידָתִֽי׃ <WH3173> my darling

ה֭וֹשִׁיעֵנִי <WH3467> Save מִפִּ֣י <WH6310> mouth אַרְיֵ֑ה <WH738> me from the lion's וּמִקַּרְנֵ֖י <WH7161> me from the horns רֵמִ֣ים <WH7214> of the unicorns עֲנִיתָֽנִי׃ <WH6030> for thou hast heard

אֲסַפְּרָ֣ה <WH5608> I will declare שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> thy name לְאֶחָ֑י <WH251> unto my brethren בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst קָהָ֣ל <WH6951> of the congregation אֲהַלְלֶֽךָּ׃ <WH1984> will I praise

יִרְאֵ֤י <WH3373> Ye that fear יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> the LORD הַֽלְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> praise כָּל־ <WH3605> All זֶ֣רַע <WH2233> him all ye the seed יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> of Jacob כַּבְּד֑וּהוּ <WH3513> glorify וְג֥וּרוּ <WH1481> him and fear מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <WH4480> of Him כָּל־ <WH3605> all זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> him all ye the seed יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor בָזָ֨ה <WH959> For he hath not despised וְלֹ֪א <WH3808> Nor שִׁקַּ֡ץ <WH8262> nor abhorred עֱנ֬וּת <WH6039> the affliction עָנִ֗י <WH6041> of the afflicted וְלֹא־ <WH3808> Nor הִסְתִּ֣יר <WH5641> neither hath he hid פָּנָ֣יו <WH6440> his face מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> at וּֽבְשַׁוְּע֖וֹ <WH7768> from him but when he cried אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> about שָׁמֵֽעַ׃ <WH8085> unto him he heard

מֵ֥אִתְּךָ֗ <WH853> תְֽהִלָּ֫תִ֥י <WH8416> My praise בְּקָהָ֥ל <WH6951> congregation רָ֑ב <WH7227> [shall be] of thee in the great נְדָרַ֥י <WH5088> my vows אֲ֝שַׁלֵּ֗ם <WH7999> I will pay נֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> before יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <WH3373> before them that fear

יֹאכְל֬וּ <WH398> shall eat עֲנָוִ֨ים ׀ <WH6035> The meek וְיִשְׂבָּ֗עוּ <WH7646> and be satisfied יְהַֽלְל֣וּ <WH1984> they shall praise יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD דֹּ֣רְשָׁ֑יו <WH1875> that seek יְחִ֖י <WH2421> shall live לְבַבְכֶ֣ם <WH3824> him your heart לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> for ever

יִזְכְּר֤וּ ׀ <WH2142> shall remember וְיָשֻׁ֣בוּ <WH7725> and turn אֶל־ <WH413> to יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> All אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> All the ends אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the world וְיִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ <WH7812> shall worship לְ֝פָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> before כָּֽל־ <WH3605> and all מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <WH4940> and all the kindreds גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of the nations
כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> [is] the LORD'S הַמְּלוּכָ֑ה <WH4410> For the kingdom וּ֝מֹשֵׁ֗ל <WH4910> and he [is] the governor בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> among the nations

אָכְל֬וּ <WH398> shall eat וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֨וּ ׀ <WH7812> and worship כָּֽל־ <WH3605> All דִּשְׁנֵי־ <WH1879> All [they that be] fat אֶ֗רֶץ <WH776> upon earth לְפָנָ֣יו <WH6440> before יִ֭כְרְעוּ <WH3766> shall bow כָּל־ <WH3605> All יוֹרְדֵ֣י <WH3381> all they that go down עָפָ֑ר <WH6083> to the dust וְ֝נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> his own soul לֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot חִיָּֽה׃ <WH2421> him and none can keep alive
זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> A seed יַֽעַבְדֶ֑נּוּ <WH5647> shall serve יְסֻפַּ֖ר <WH5608> him it shall be accounted לַֽאדֹנָ֣י <WH136> to the Lord לַדּֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> for a generation

יָ֭בֹאוּ <WH935> They shall come וְיַגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> and shall declare צִדְקָת֑וֹ <WH6666> his righteousness לְעַ֥ם <WH5971> unto a people נ֝וֹלָ֗ד <WH3205> that shall be born כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> that he hath done
